          <ref-selector
            type="branch"
            data-targets="input-demux.sinks"

            prefetch-on-mouseover
          >

            <template data-target="ref-selector.fetchFailedTemplate">
              <div class="SelectMenu-message" data-index="{{ index }}">Could not load branches</div>
            </template>

              <template data-target="ref-selector.noMatchTemplate">
    <div class="SelectMenu-message">Nothing to show</div>
</template>


            <!-- TODO: this max-height is necessary or else the branch list won't scroll.  why? -->

</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L48" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="48"></td>
          <td id="LC48" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elsinore. A platform before the Castle.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L49" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="49"></td>
          <td id="LC49" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L50" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="50"></td>
          <td id="LC50" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enter two Sentinels-[first,] Francisco, [who paces up and down</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L51" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="51"></td>
          <td id="LC51" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at his post; then] Bernardo, [who approaches him].</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L52" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="52"></td>
          <td id="LC52" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L53" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="53"></td>
          <td id="LC53" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Who&#39;s there.?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L54" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="54"></td>
          <td id="LC54" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. Nay, answer me. Stand and unfold yourself.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L55" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="55"></td>
          <td id="LC55" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Long live the King!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L56" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="56"></td>
          <td id="LC56" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. Bernardo?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L57" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="57"></td>
          <td id="LC57" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. He.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L58" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="58"></td>
          <td id="LC58" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. You come most carefully upon your hour.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L59" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="59"></td>
          <td id="LC59" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. &#39;Tis now struck twelve. Get thee to bed, Francisco.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L60" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="60"></td>
          <td id="LC60" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. For this relief much thanks. &#39;Tis bitter cold,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L61" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="61"></td>
          <td id="LC61" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And I am sick at heart.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L62" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="62"></td>
          <td id="LC62" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Have you had quiet guard?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L63" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="63"></td>
          <td id="LC63" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. Not a mouse stirring.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L64" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="64"></td>
          <td id="LC64" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Well, good night.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L65" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="65"></td>
          <td id="LC65" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    If you do meet Horatio and Marcellus,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L66" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="66"></td>
          <td id="LC66" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The rivals of my watch, bid them make haste.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L67" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="67"></td>
          <td id="LC67" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L68" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="68"></td>
          <td id="LC68" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                    Enter Horatio and Marcellus.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L69" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="69"></td>
          <td id="LC69" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L70" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="70"></td>
          <td id="LC70" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. I think I hear them. Stand, ho! Who is there?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L71" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="71"></td>
          <td id="LC71" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Friends to this ground.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L72" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="72"></td>
          <td id="LC72" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. And liegemen to the Dane.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L73" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="73"></td>
          <td id="LC73" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. Give you good night.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L74" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="74"></td>
          <td id="LC74" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. O, farewell, honest soldier.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L75" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="75"></td>
          <td id="LC75" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Who hath reliev&#39;d you?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L76" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="76"></td>
          <td id="LC76" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Fran. Bernardo hath my place.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L77" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="77"></td>
          <td id="LC77" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Give you good night.                                   Exit.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L78" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="78"></td>
          <td id="LC78" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. Holla, Bernardo!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L79" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="79"></td>
          <td id="LC79" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Say-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L80" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="80"></td>
          <td id="LC80" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    What, is Horatio there ?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L81" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="81"></td>
          <td id="LC81" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. A piece of him.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L82" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="82"></td>
          <td id="LC82" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Welcome, Horatio. Welcome, good Marcellus.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L83" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="83"></td>
          <td id="LC83" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. What, has this thing appear&#39;d again to-night?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L84" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="84"></td>
          <td id="LC84" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. I have seen nothing.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L85" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="85"></td>
          <td id="LC85" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. Horatio says &#39;tis but our fantasy,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L86" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="86"></td>
          <td id="LC86" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And will not let belief take hold of him</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L87" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="87"></td>
          <td id="LC87" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Touching this dreaded sight, twice seen of us.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L88" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="88"></td>
          <td id="LC88" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Therefore I have entreated him along,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L89" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="89"></td>
          <td id="LC89" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    With us to watch the minutes of this night,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L90" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="90"></td>
          <td id="LC90" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That, if again this apparition come,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L91" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="91"></td>
          <td id="LC91" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    He may approve our eyes and speak to it.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L92" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="92"></td>
          <td id="LC92" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Tush, tush, &#39;twill not appear.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L93" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="93"></td>
          <td id="LC93" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Sit down awhile,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L94" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="94"></td>
          <td id="LC94" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And let us once again assail your ears,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L95" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="95"></td>
          <td id="LC95" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That are so fortified against our story,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L96" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="96"></td>
          <td id="LC96" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    What we two nights have seen.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L97" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="97"></td>
          <td id="LC97" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Well, sit we down,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L98" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="98"></td>
          <td id="LC98" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And let us hear Bernardo speak of this.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L99" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="99"></td>
          <td id="LC99" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. Last night of all,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L100" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="100"></td>
          <td id="LC100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    When yond same star that&#39;s westward from the pole</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L101" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="101"></td>
          <td id="LC101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Had made his course t&#39; illume that part of heaven</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L102" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="102"></td>
          <td id="LC102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Where now it burns, Marcellus and myself,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L103" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="103"></td>
          <td id="LC103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The bell then beating one-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L104" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="104"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                        Enter Ghost.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. Peace! break thee off! Look where it comes again!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L108" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="108"></td>
          <td id="LC108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. In the same figure, like the King that&#39;s dead.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. Thou art a scholar; speak to it, Horatio.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L111" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="111"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        <tr>
          <td id="L113" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="113"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. What art thou that usurp&#39;st this time of night</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L115" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="115"></td>
          <td id="LC115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Together with that fair and warlike form</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L116" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="116"></td>
          <td id="LC116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    In which the majesty of buried Denmark</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L117" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="117"></td>
          <td id="LC117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Did sometimes march? By heaven I charge thee speak!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L118" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="118"></td>
          <td id="LC118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. It is offended.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L119" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="119"></td>
          <td id="LC119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. See, it stalks away!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L120" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="120"></td>
          <td id="LC120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Stay! Speak, speak! I charge thee speak!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L121" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="121"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Is not this something more than fantasy?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    What think you on&#39;t?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L126" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="126"></td>
          <td id="LC126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Before my God, I might not this believe</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L127" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="127"></td>
          <td id="LC127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Without the sensible and true avouch</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L128" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="128"></td>
          <td id="LC128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Of mine own eyes.  </td>
        </tr>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Such was the very armour he had on</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L132" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="132"></td>
          <td id="LC132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    When he th&#39; ambitious Norway combated.</td>

        <tr>

          <td id="LC133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    So frown&#39;d he once when, in an angry parle,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L134" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="134"></td>
          <td id="LC134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    He smote the sledded Polacks on the ice.</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L135" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="135"></td>
          <td id="LC135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    &#39;Tis strange.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L136" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="136"></td>
          <td id="LC136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. Thus twice before, and jump at this dead hour,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L137" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="137"></td>
          <td id="LC137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    With martial stalk hath he gone by our watch.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L138" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="138"></td>
          <td id="LC138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. In what particular thought to work I know not;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L139" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="139"></td>
          <td id="LC139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But, in the gross and scope of my opinion,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L140" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="140"></td>
          <td id="LC140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    This bodes some strange eruption to our state.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L141" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="141"></td>
          <td id="LC141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. Good now, sit down, and tell me he that knows,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L142" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="142"></td>
          <td id="LC142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Why this same strict and most observant watch</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L143" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="143"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="LC144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And why such daily cast of brazen cannon</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And foreign mart for implements of war;</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Why such impress of shipwrights, whose sore task</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L147" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="147"></td>
          <td id="LC147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Does not divide the Sunday from the week.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    What might be toward, that this sweaty haste  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L150" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="150"></td>
          <td id="LC150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Who is&#39;t that can inform me?</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L152" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="152"></td>
          <td id="LC152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    At least, the whisper goes so. Our last king,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L153" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="153"></td>
          <td id="LC153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Whose image even but now appear&#39;d to us,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L154" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="154"></td>
          <td id="LC154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Was, as you know, by Fortinbras of Norway,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L155" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="155"></td>
          <td id="LC155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Thereto prick&#39;d on by a most emulate pride,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L156" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="156"></td>
          <td id="LC156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Dar&#39;d to the combat; in which our valiant Hamlet</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L157" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="157"></td>
          <td id="LC157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (For so this side of our known world esteem&#39;d him)</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L158" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="158"></td>
          <td id="LC158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Did slay this Fortinbras; who, by a seal&#39;d compact,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L159" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="159"></td>
          <td id="LC159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Well ratified by law and heraldry,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L160" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="160"></td>
          <td id="LC160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Did forfeit, with his life, all those his lands</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L161" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="161"></td>
          <td id="LC161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Which he stood seiz&#39;d of, to the conqueror;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L162" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="162"></td>
          <td id="LC162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Against the which a moiety competent</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L163" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="163"></td>
          <td id="LC163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Was gaged by our king; which had return&#39;d</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L164" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="164"></td>
          <td id="LC164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To the inheritance of Fortinbras,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L165" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="165"></td>
          <td id="LC165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Had he been vanquisher, as, by the same comart</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L166" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="166"></td>
          <td id="LC166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And carriage of the article design&#39;d,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L167" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="167"></td>
          <td id="LC167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    His fell to Hamlet. Now, sir, young Fortinbras,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L168" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="168"></td>
          <td id="LC168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Of unimproved mettle hot and full,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L169" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="169"></td>
          <td id="LC169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Hath in the skirts of Norway, here and there,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L170" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="170"></td>
          <td id="LC170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Shark&#39;d up a list of lawless resolutes,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L171" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="171"></td>
          <td id="LC171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For food and diet, to some enterprise</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L172" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="172"></td>
          <td id="LC172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That hath a stomach in&#39;t; which is no other,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L173" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="173"></td>
          <td id="LC173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As it doth well appear unto our state,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L174" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="174"></td>
          <td id="LC174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But to recover of us, by strong hand</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L175" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="175"></td>
          <td id="LC175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And terms compulsatory, those foresaid lands</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L176" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="176"></td>
          <td id="LC176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    So by his father lost; and this, I take it,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L177" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="177"></td>
          <td id="LC177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Is the main motive of our preparations,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L178" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="178"></td>
          <td id="LC178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The source of this our watch, and the chief head</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L179" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="179"></td>
          <td id="LC179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Of this post-haste and romage in the land.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L180" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="180"></td>
          <td id="LC180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. I think it be no other but e&#39;en so.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L181" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="181"></td>
          <td id="LC181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Well may it sort that this portentous figure</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L182" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="182"></td>
          <td id="LC182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Comes armed through our watch, so like the King</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L183" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="183"></td>
          <td id="LC183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That was and is the question of these wars.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L184" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="184"></td>
          <td id="LC184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. A mote it is to trouble the mind&#39;s eye.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L185" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="185"></td>
          <td id="LC185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    In the most high and palmy state of Rome,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L186" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="186"></td>
          <td id="LC186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    A little ere the mightiest Julius fell,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L187" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="187"></td>
          <td id="LC187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The graves stood tenantless, and the sheeted dead</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L188" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="188"></td>
          <td id="LC188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Did squeak and gibber in the Roman streets;  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L189" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="189"></td>
          <td id="LC189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As stars with trains of fire, and dews of blood,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L190" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="190"></td>
          <td id="LC190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Disasters in the sun; and the moist star</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L191" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="191"></td>
          <td id="LC191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Upon whose influence Neptune&#39;s empire stands</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L192" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="192"></td>
          <td id="LC192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Was sick almost to doomsday with eclipse.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L193" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="193"></td>
          <td id="LC193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And even the like precurse of fierce events,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L194" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="194"></td>
          <td id="LC194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As harbingers preceding still the fates</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L195" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="195"></td>
          <td id="LC195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And prologue to the omen coming on,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L196" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="196"></td>
          <td id="LC196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Have heaven and earth together demonstrated</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L197" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="197"></td>
          <td id="LC197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Unto our climature and countrymen.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L198" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="198"></td>
          <td id="LC198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L199" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="199"></td>
          <td id="LC199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                      Enter Ghost again.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L200" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="200"></td>
          <td id="LC200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L201" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="201"></td>
          <td id="LC201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But soft! behold! Lo, where it comes again!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L202" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="202"></td>
          <td id="LC202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I&#39;ll cross it, though it blast me.- Stay illusion!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L203" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="203"></td>
          <td id="LC203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                               Spreads his arms.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L204" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="204"></td>
          <td id="LC204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    If thou hast any sound, or use of voice,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L205" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="205"></td>
          <td id="LC205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Speak to me.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L206" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="206"></td>
          <td id="LC206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    If there be any good thing to be done,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="207"></td>
          <td id="LC207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That may to thee do ease, and, race to me,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L208" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="208"></td>
          <td id="LC208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Speak to me.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L209" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="209"></td>
          <td id="LC209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    If thou art privy to thy country&#39;s fate,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L210" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="210"></td>
          <td id="LC210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Which happily foreknowing may avoid,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L211" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="211"></td>
          <td id="LC211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    O, speak!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L212" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="212"></td>
          <td id="LC212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Or if thou hast uphoarded in thy life</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L213" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="213"></td>
          <td id="LC213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Extorted treasure in the womb of earth</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L214" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="214"></td>
          <td id="LC214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (For which, they say, you spirits oft walk in death),</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L215" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="215"></td>
          <td id="LC215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                                 The cock crows.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L216" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="216"></td>
          <td id="LC216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Speak of it! Stay, and speak!- Stop it, Marcellus!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L217" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="217"></td>
          <td id="LC217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. Shall I strike at it with my partisan?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="218"></td>
          <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Do, if it will not stand.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L219" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="219"></td>
          <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. &#39;Tis here!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L220" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="220"></td>
          <td id="LC220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. &#39;Tis here!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L221" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="221"></td>
          <td id="LC221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. &#39;Tis gone!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L222" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="222"></td>
          <td id="LC222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                                     Exit Ghost.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L223" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="223"></td>
          <td id="LC223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    We do it wrong, being so majestical,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L224" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="224"></td>
          <td id="LC224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To offer it the show of violence;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L225" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="225"></td>
          <td id="LC225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For it is as the air, invulnerable,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L226" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="226"></td>
          <td id="LC226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And our vain blows malicious mockery.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L227" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="227"></td>
          <td id="LC227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ber. It was about to speak, when the cock crew.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L228" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="228"></td>
          <td id="LC228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. And then it started, like a guilty thing  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L229" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="229"></td>
          <td id="LC229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Upon a fearful summons. I have heard</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L230" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="230"></td>
          <td id="LC230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The cock, that is the trumpet to the morn,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L231" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="231"></td>
          <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Doth with his lofty and shrill-sounding throat</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L232" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="232"></td>
          <td id="LC232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Awake the god of day; and at his warning,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L233" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="233"></td>
          <td id="LC233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Whether in sea or fire, in earth or air,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L234" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="234"></td>
          <td id="LC234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Th&#39; extravagant and erring spirit hies</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L235" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="235"></td>
          <td id="LC235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To his confine; and of the truth herein</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L236" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="236"></td>
          <td id="LC236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    This present object made probation.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L237" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="237"></td>
          <td id="LC237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Mar. It faded on the crowing of the cock.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L238" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="238"></td>
          <td id="LC238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Some say that ever, &#39;gainst that season comes</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L239" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="239"></td>
          <td id="LC239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Wherein our Saviour&#39;s birth is celebrated,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L240" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="240"></td>
          <td id="LC240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The bird of dawning singeth all night long;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L241" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="241"></td>
          <td id="LC241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And then, they say, no spirit dare stir abroad,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="242"></td>
          <td id="LC242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The nights are wholesome, then no planets strike,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="243"></td>
          <td id="LC243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    No fairy takes, nor witch hath power to charm,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L244" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="244"></td>
          <td id="LC244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    So hallow&#39;d and so gracious is the time.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L245" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="245"></td>
          <td id="LC245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. So have I heard and do in part believe it.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L246" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="246"></td>
          <td id="LC246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But look, the morn, in russet mantle clad,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L247" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="247"></td>
          <td id="LC247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Walks o&#39;er the dew of yon high eastward hill.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L248" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="248"></td>
          <td id="LC248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Break we our watch up; and by my advice  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L249" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="249"></td>
          <td id="LC249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Let us impart what we have seen to-night</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L250" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="250"></td>
          <td id="LC250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Unto young Hamlet; for, upon my life,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L251" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="251"></td>
          <td id="LC251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    This spirit, dumb to us, will speak to him.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L252" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="252"></td>
          <td id="LC252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Do you consent we shall acquaint him with it,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L253" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="253"></td>
          <td id="LC253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As needful in our loves, fitting our duty?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L254" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="254"></td>
          <td id="LC254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Let&#39;s do&#39;t, I pray; and I this morning know</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L255" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="255"></td>
          <td id="LC255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Where we shall find him most conveniently.           Exeunt.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L256" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="256"></td>
          <td id="LC256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L257" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="257"></td>
          <td id="LC257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L258" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="258"></td>
          <td id="LC258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L259" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="259"></td>
          <td id="LC259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L260" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="260"></td>
          <td id="LC260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Scene II.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L261" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="261"></td>
          <td id="LC261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elsinore. A room of state in the Castle.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L262" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="262"></td>
          <td id="LC262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L263" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="263"></td>
          <td id="LC263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Flourish. [Enter Claudius, King of Denmark, Gertrude the Queen, Hamlet,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L264" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="264"></td>
          <td id="LC264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Polonius, Laertes and his sister Ophelia, [Voltemand, Cornelius,]</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L265" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="265"></td>
          <td id="LC265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lords Attendant.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L266" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="266"></td>
          <td id="LC266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L267" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="267"></td>
          <td id="LC267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. Though yet of Hamlet our dear brother&#39;s death</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L268" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="268"></td>
          <td id="LC268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The memory be green, and that it us befitted</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L269" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="269"></td>
          <td id="LC269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To bear our hearts in grief, and our whole kingdom</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L270" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="270"></td>
          <td id="LC270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To be contracted in one brow of woe,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L271" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="271"></td>
          <td id="LC271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Yet so far hath discretion fought with nature</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L272" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="272"></td>
          <td id="LC272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That we with wisest sorrow think on him</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L273" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="273"></td>
          <td id="LC273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Together with remembrance of ourselves.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L274" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="274"></td>
          <td id="LC274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Therefore our sometime sister, now our queen,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L275" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="275"></td>
          <td id="LC275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Th&#39; imperial jointress to this warlike state,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L276" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="276"></td>
          <td id="LC276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Have we, as &#39;twere with a defeated joy,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L277" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="277"></td>
          <td id="LC277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    With an auspicious, and a dropping eye,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L278" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="278"></td>
          <td id="LC278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    With mirth in funeral, and with dirge in marriage,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L279" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="279"></td>
          <td id="LC279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    In equal scale weighing delight and dole,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L280" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="280"></td>
          <td id="LC280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Taken to wife; nor have we herein barr&#39;d</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L281" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="281"></td>
          <td id="LC281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Your better wisdoms, which have freely gone  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L282" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="282"></td>
          <td id="LC282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    With this affair along. For all, our thanks.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L283" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="283"></td>
          <td id="LC283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Now follows, that you know, young Fortinbras,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L284" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="284"></td>
          <td id="LC284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Holding a weak supposal of our worth,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L285" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="285"></td>
          <td id="LC285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Or thinking by our late dear brother&#39;s death</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L286" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="286"></td>
          <td id="LC286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Our state to be disjoint and out of frame,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L287" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="287"></td>
          <td id="LC287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Colleagued with this dream of his advantage,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L288" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="288"></td>
          <td id="LC288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    He hath not fail&#39;d to pester us with message</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L289" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="289"></td>
          <td id="LC289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Importing the surrender of those lands</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L290" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="290"></td>
          <td id="LC290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Lost by his father, with all bands of law,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L291" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="291"></td>
          <td id="LC291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To our most valiant brother. So much for him.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L292" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="292"></td>
          <td id="LC292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Now for ourself and for this time of meeting.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L293" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="293"></td>
          <td id="LC293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Thus much the business is: we have here writ</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L294" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="294"></td>
          <td id="LC294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To Norway, uncle of young Fortinbras,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L295" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="295"></td>
          <td id="LC295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Who, impotent and bedrid, scarcely hears</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L296" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="296"></td>
          <td id="LC296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Of this his nephew&#39;s purpose, to suppress</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L297" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="297"></td>
          <td id="LC297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    His further gait herein, in that the levies,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L298" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="298"></td>
          <td id="LC298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The lists, and full proportions are all made</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L299" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="299"></td>
          <td id="LC299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Out of his subject; and we here dispatch</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L300" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="300"></td>
          <td id="LC300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    You, good Cornelius, and you, Voltemand,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L301" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="301"></td>
          <td id="LC301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For bearers of this greeting to old Norway,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L302" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="302"></td>
          <td id="LC302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Giving to you no further personal power</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L303" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="303"></td>
          <td id="LC303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To business with the King, more than the scope</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L304" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="304"></td>
          <td id="LC304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Of these dilated articles allow.            [Gives a paper.]</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L305" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="305"></td>
          <td id="LC305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Farewell, and let your haste commend your duty.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L306" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="306"></td>
          <td id="LC306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Cor., Volt. In that, and all things, will we show our duty.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L307" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="307"></td>
          <td id="LC307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. We doubt it nothing. Heartily farewell.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L308" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="308"></td>
          <td id="LC308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                 Exeunt Voltemand and Cornelius.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L309" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="309"></td>
          <td id="LC309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And now, Laertes, what&#39;s the news with you?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L310" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="310"></td>
          <td id="LC310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    You told us of some suit. What is&#39;t, Laertes?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L311" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="311"></td>
          <td id="LC311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    You cannot speak of reason to the Dane</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L312" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="312"></td>
          <td id="LC312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And lose your voice. What wouldst thou beg, Laertes,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L313" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="313"></td>
          <td id="LC313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That shall not be my offer, not thy asking?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L314" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="314"></td>
          <td id="LC314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The head is not more native to the heart,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L315" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="315"></td>
          <td id="LC315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The hand more instrumental to the mouth,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L316" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="316"></td>
          <td id="LC316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Than is the throne of Denmark to thy father.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L317" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="317"></td>
          <td id="LC317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    What wouldst thou have, Laertes?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L318" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="318"></td>
          <td id="LC318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Laer. My dread lord,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L319" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="319"></td>
          <td id="LC319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Your leave and favour to return to France;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L320" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="320"></td>
          <td id="LC320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    From whence though willingly I came to Denmark</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L321" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="321"></td>
          <td id="LC321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To show my duty in your coronation,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L322" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="322"></td>
          <td id="LC322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Yet now I must confess, that duty done,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L323" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="323"></td>
          <td id="LC323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    My thoughts and wishes bend again toward France</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L324" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="324"></td>
          <td id="LC324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And bow them to your gracious leave and pardon.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L325" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="325"></td>
          <td id="LC325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. Have you your father&#39;s leave? What says Polonius?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L326" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="326"></td>
          <td id="LC326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Pol. He hath, my lord, wrung from me my slow leave</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L327" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="327"></td>
          <td id="LC327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    By laboursome petition, and at last</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L328" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="328"></td>
          <td id="LC328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Upon his will I seal&#39;d my hard consent.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L329" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="329"></td>
          <td id="LC329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I do beseech you give him leave to go.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L330" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="330"></td>
          <td id="LC330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. Take thy fair hour, Laertes. Time be thine,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L331" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="331"></td>
          <td id="LC331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And thy best graces spend it at thy will!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L332" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="332"></td>
          <td id="LC332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But now, my cousin Hamlet, and my son-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L333" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="333"></td>
          <td id="LC333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. [aside] A little more than kin, and less than kind!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L334" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="334"></td>
          <td id="LC334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. How is it that the clouds still hang on you?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L335" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="335"></td>
          <td id="LC335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Not so, my lord. I am too much i&#39; th&#39; sun.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L336" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="336"></td>
          <td id="LC336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Queen. Good Hamlet, cast thy nighted colour off,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L337" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="337"></td>
          <td id="LC337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And let thine eye look like a friend on Denmark.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L338" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="338"></td>
          <td id="LC338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Do not for ever with thy vailed lids</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L339" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="339"></td>
          <td id="LC339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Seek for thy noble father in the dust.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L340" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="340"></td>
          <td id="LC340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Thou know&#39;st &#39;tis common. All that lives must die,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L341" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="341"></td>
          <td id="LC341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Passing through nature to eternity.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L342" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="342"></td>
          <td id="LC342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Ay, madam, it is common.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L343" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="343"></td>
          <td id="LC343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Queen. If it be,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L344" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="344"></td>
          <td id="LC344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Why seems it so particular with thee?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L345" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="345"></td>
          <td id="LC345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Seems, madam, Nay, it is. I know not &#39;seems.&#39;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L346" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="346"></td>
          <td id="LC346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    &#39;Tis not alone my inky cloak, good mother,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L347" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="347"></td>
          <td id="LC347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Nor customary suits of solemn black,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L348" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="348"></td>
          <td id="LC348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Nor windy suspiration of forc&#39;d breath,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L349" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="349"></td>
          <td id="LC349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    No, nor the fruitful river in the eye,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L350" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="350"></td>
          <td id="LC350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Nor the dejected havior of the visage,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L351" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="351"></td>
          <td id="LC351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Together with all forms, moods, shapes of grief,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L352" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="352"></td>
          <td id="LC352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    &#39;That can denote me truly. These indeed seem,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L353" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="353"></td>
          <td id="LC353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For they are actions that a man might play;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L354" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="354"></td>
          <td id="LC354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But I have that within which passeth show-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L355" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="355"></td>
          <td id="LC355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    These but the trappings and the suits of woe.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L356" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="356"></td>
          <td id="LC356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. &#39;Tis sweet and commendable in your nature, Hamlet,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L357" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="357"></td>
          <td id="LC357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To give these mourning duties to your father;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L358" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="358"></td>
          <td id="LC358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But you must know, your father lost a father;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
