          <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1975"></td>
          <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    not.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1976"></td>
          <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. I was the more deceived.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1977"></td>
          <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Get thee to a nunnery! Why wouldst thou be a breeder of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1978"></td>
          <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    sinners? I am myself indifferent honest, but yet I could accuse</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1979"></td>
          <td id="LC1979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    me of such things that it were better my mother had not borne me.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1980"></td>
          <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I am very proud, revengeful, ambitious; with more offences at my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1981"></td>
          <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    beck than I have thoughts to put them in, imagination to give</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1982"></td>
          <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    them shape, or time to act them in. What should such fellows as I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1983"></td>
          <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    do, crawling between earth and heaven? We are arrant knaves all;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1984"></td>
          <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    believe none of us. Go thy ways to a nunnery. Where&#39;s your</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1985"></td>
          <td id="LC1985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    father?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1986"></td>
          <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. At home, my lord.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1987" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1987"></td>
          <td id="LC1987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Let the doors be shut upon him, that he may play the fool</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1988" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1988"></td>
          <td id="LC1988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    nowhere but in&#39;s own house. Farewell.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1989" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1989"></td>
          <td id="LC1989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. O, help him, you sweet heavens!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1990" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1990"></td>
          <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. If thou dost marry, I&#39;ll give thee this plague for thy dowry:</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1991" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1991"></td>
          <td id="LC1991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    be thou as chaste as ice, as pure as snow, thou shalt not escape</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1992" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1992"></td>
          <td id="LC1992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    calumny. Get thee to a nunnery. Go, farewell. Or if thou wilt</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1993" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1993"></td>
          <td id="LC1993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    needs marry, marry a fool; for wise men know well enough what</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1994" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1994"></td>
          <td id="LC1994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    monsters you make of them. To a nunnery, go; and quickly too.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1995" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1995"></td>
          <td id="LC1995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Farewell.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1996" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1996"></td>
          <td id="LC1996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. O heavenly powers, restore him!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1997" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1997"></td>
          <td id="LC1997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I have heard of your paintings too, well enough. God hath</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1998" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1998"></td>
          <td id="LC1998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    given you one face, and you make yourselves another. You jig, you</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1999" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1999"></td>
          <td id="LC1999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    amble, and you lisp; you nickname God&#39;s creatures and make your  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2000" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2000"></td>
          <td id="LC2000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    wantonness your ignorance. Go to, I&#39;ll no more on&#39;t! it hath made</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2001" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2001"></td>
          <td id="LC2001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    me mad. I say, we will have no moe marriages. Those that are</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2002" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2002"></td>
          <td id="LC2002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    married already- all but one- shall live; the rest shall keep as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2003" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2003"></td>
          <td id="LC2003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    they are. To a nunnery, go.                            Exit.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2004" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2004"></td>
          <td id="LC2004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. O, what a noble mind is here o&#39;erthrown!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2005" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2005"></td>
          <td id="LC2005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The courtier&#39;s, scholar&#39;s, soldier&#39;s, eye, tongue, sword,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2006" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2006"></td>
          <td id="LC2006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Th&#39; expectancy and rose of the fair state,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2007" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2007"></td>
          <td id="LC2007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The glass of fashion and the mould of form,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2008" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2008"></td>
          <td id="LC2008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Th&#39; observ&#39;d of all observers- quite, quite down!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2009" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2009"></td>
          <td id="LC2009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And I, of ladies most deject and wretched,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2010" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2010"></td>
          <td id="LC2010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That suck&#39;d the honey of his music vows,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2011" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2011"></td>
          <td id="LC2011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Now see that noble and most sovereign reason,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2012" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2012"></td>
          <td id="LC2012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Like sweet bells jangled, out of tune and harsh;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2013"></td>
          <td id="LC2013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That unmatch&#39;d form and feature of blown youth</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2014"></td>
          <td id="LC2014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Blasted with ecstasy. O, woe is me</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2015"></td>
          <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    T&#39; have seen what I have seen, see what I see!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2016"></td>
          <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2017"></td>
          <td id="LC2017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                   Enter King and Polonius.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2018" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2018"></td>
          <td id="LC2018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2019" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2019"></td>
          <td id="LC2019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. Love? his affections do not that way tend;  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2020" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2020"></td>
          <td id="LC2020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Nor what he spake, though it lack&#39;d form a little,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2021" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2021"></td>
          <td id="LC2021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Was not like madness. There&#39;s something in his soul</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2022" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2022"></td>
          <td id="LC2022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    O&#39;er which his melancholy sits on brood;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2023" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2023"></td>
          <td id="LC2023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And I do doubt the hatch and the disclose</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2024" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2024"></td>
          <td id="LC2024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Will be some danger; which for to prevent,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2025" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2025"></td>
          <td id="LC2025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I have in quick determination</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2026" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2026"></td>
          <td id="LC2026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Thus set it down: he shall with speed to England</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2027" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2027"></td>
          <td id="LC2027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For the demand of our neglected tribute.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2028" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2028"></td>
          <td id="LC2028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Haply the seas, and countries different,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2029" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2029"></td>
          <td id="LC2029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    With variable objects, shall expel</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2030" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2030"></td>
          <td id="LC2030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    This something-settled matter in his heart,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2031" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2031"></td>
          <td id="LC2031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Whereon his brains still beating puts him thus</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2032" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2032"></td>
          <td id="LC2032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    From fashion of himself. What think you on&#39;t?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2033" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2033"></td>
          <td id="LC2033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Pol. It shall do well. But yet do I believe</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2034" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2034"></td>
          <td id="LC2034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The origin and commencement of his grief</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2035" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2035"></td>
          <td id="LC2035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Sprung from neglected love.- How now, Ophelia?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2036" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2036"></td>
          <td id="LC2036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    You need not tell us what Lord Hamlet said.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2037" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2037"></td>
          <td id="LC2037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    We heard it all.- My lord, do as you please;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2038" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2038"></td>
          <td id="LC2038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But if you hold it fit, after the play</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2039" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2039"></td>
          <td id="LC2039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Let his queen mother all alone entreat him  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2040" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2040"></td>
          <td id="LC2040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To show his grief. Let her be round with him;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2041" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2041"></td>
          <td id="LC2041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And I&#39;ll be plac&#39;d so please you, in the ear</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2042" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2042"></td>
          <td id="LC2042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Of all their conference. If she find him not,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2043" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2043"></td>
          <td id="LC2043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To England send him; or confine him where</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2044" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2044"></td>
          <td id="LC2044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Your wisdom best shall think.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2045" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2045"></td>
          <td id="LC2045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. It shall be so.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2046" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2046"></td>
          <td id="LC2046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Madness in great ones must not unwatch&#39;d go.         Exeunt.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2047" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2047"></td>
          <td id="LC2047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2048" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2048"></td>
          <td id="LC2048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2049" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2049"></td>
          <td id="LC2049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2050" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2050"></td>
          <td id="LC2050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2051" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2051"></td>
          <td id="LC2051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Scene II.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2052" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2052"></td>
          <td id="LC2052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elsinore. hall in the Castle.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2053" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2053"></td>
          <td id="LC2053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2054" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2054"></td>
          <td id="LC2054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enter Hamlet and three of the Players.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2055" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2055"></td>
          <td id="LC2055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2056" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2056"></td>
          <td id="LC2056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Speak the speech, I pray you, as I pronounc&#39;d it to you,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2057" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2057"></td>
          <td id="LC2057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    trippingly on the tongue. But if you mouth it, as many of our</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2058" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2058"></td>
          <td id="LC2058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    players do, I had as live the town crier spoke my lines. Nor do</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2059" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2059"></td>
          <td id="LC2059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    not saw the air too much with your hand, thus, but use all</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2060" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2060"></td>
          <td id="LC2060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    gently; for in the very torrent, tempest, and (as I may say)</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2061" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2061"></td>
          <td id="LC2061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    whirlwind of your passion, you must acquire and beget a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2062" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2062"></td>
          <td id="LC2062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    temperance that may give it smoothness. O, it offends me to the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2063" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2063"></td>
          <td id="LC2063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    soul to hear a robustious periwig-pated fellow tear a passion to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2064" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2064"></td>
          <td id="LC2064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    tatters, to very rags, to split the cars of the groundlings, who</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2065" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2065"></td>
          <td id="LC2065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (for the most part) are capable of nothing but inexplicable dumb</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2066" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2066"></td>
          <td id="LC2066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    shows and noise. I would have such a fellow whipp&#39;d for o&#39;erdoing</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2067" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2067"></td>
          <td id="LC2067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Termagant. It out-herods Herod. Pray you avoid it.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2068" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2068"></td>
          <td id="LC2068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Player. I warrant your honour.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2069" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2069"></td>
          <td id="LC2069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Be not too tame neither; but let your own discretion be your</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2070" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2070"></td>
          <td id="LC2070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    tutor. Suit the action to the word, the word to the action; with</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2071" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2071"></td>
          <td id="LC2071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    this special observance, that you o&#39;erstep not the modesty of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2072" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2072"></td>
          <td id="LC2072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    nature: for anything so overdone is from the purpose of playing,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2073" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2073"></td>
          <td id="LC2073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    whose end, both at the first and now, was and is, to hold, as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2074" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2074"></td>
          <td id="LC2074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    &#39;twere, the mirror up to nature; to show Virtue her own feature,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2075" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2075"></td>
          <td id="LC2075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    scorn her own image, and the very age and body of the time his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2076" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2076"></td>
          <td id="LC2076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    form and pressure. Now this overdone, or come tardy off, though</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2077" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2077"></td>
          <td id="LC2077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    it make the unskilful laugh, cannot but make the judicious</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2078" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2078"></td>
          <td id="LC2078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    grieve; the censure of the which one must in your allowance</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2079" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2079"></td>
          <td id="LC2079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    o&#39;erweigh a whole theatre of others. O, there be players that I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2080" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2080"></td>
          <td id="LC2080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    have seen play, and heard others praise, and that highly (not to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2081" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2081"></td>
          <td id="LC2081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    speak it profanely), that, neither having the accent of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2082" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2082"></td>
          <td id="LC2082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Christians, nor the gait of Christian, pagan, nor man, have so</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2083" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2083"></td>
          <td id="LC2083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    strutted and bellowed that I have thought some of Nature&#39;s</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2084" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2084"></td>
          <td id="LC2084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    journeymen had made men, and not made them well, they imitated</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2085"></td>
          <td id="LC2085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    humanity so abominably.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2086"></td>
          <td id="LC2086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Player. I hope we have reform&#39;d that indifferently with us, sir.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2087"></td>
          <td id="LC2087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. O, reform it altogether! And let those that play your clowns</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2088"></td>
          <td id="LC2088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    speak no more than is set down for them. For there be of them</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2089" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2089"></td>
          <td id="LC2089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    that will themselves laugh, to set on some quantity of barren</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2090" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2090"></td>
          <td id="LC2090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    spectators to laugh too, though in the mean time some necessary</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2091" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2091"></td>
          <td id="LC2091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    question of the play be then to be considered. That&#39;s villanous</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2092" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2092"></td>
          <td id="LC2092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    and shows a most pitiful ambition in the fool that uses it. Go  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2093" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2093"></td>
          <td id="LC2093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    make you ready.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2094" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2094"></td>
          <td id="LC2094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                                 Exeunt Players.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2095" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2095"></td>
          <td id="LC2095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2096" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2096"></td>
          <td id="LC2096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">            Enter Polonius, Rosencrantz, and Guildenstern.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2097" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2097"></td>
          <td id="LC2097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2098" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2098"></td>
          <td id="LC2098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    How now, my lord? Will the King hear this piece of work?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2099" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2099"></td>
          <td id="LC2099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Pol. And the Queen too, and that presently.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2100" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2100"></td>
          <td id="LC2100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Bid the players make haste, [Exit Polonius.] Will you two</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2101" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2101"></td>
          <td id="LC2101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    help to hasten them?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2102"></td>
          <td id="LC2102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Both. We will, my lord.                       Exeunt they two.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2103" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2103"></td>
          <td id="LC2103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. What, ho, Horatio!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2104" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2104"></td>
          <td id="LC2104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2105" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2105"></td>
          <td id="LC2105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                      Enter Horatio.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2106" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2106"></td>
          <td id="LC2106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2107" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2107"></td>
          <td id="LC2107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Here, sweet lord, at your service.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2108" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2108"></td>
          <td id="LC2108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Horatio, thou art e&#39;en as just a man</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2109" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2109"></td>
          <td id="LC2109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As e&#39;er my conversation cop&#39;d withal.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2110" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2110"></td>
          <td id="LC2110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. O, my dear lord!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2111" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2111"></td>
          <td id="LC2111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Nay, do not think I flatter;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2112"></td>
          <td id="LC2112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For what advancement may I hope from thee,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2113"></td>
          <td id="LC2113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That no revenue hast but thy good spirits</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2114"></td>
          <td id="LC2114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To feed and clothe thee? Why should the poor be flatter&#39;d?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2115" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2115"></td>
          <td id="LC2115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    No, let the candied tongue lick absurd pomp,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2116" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2116"></td>
          <td id="LC2116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And crook the pregnant hinges of the knee</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2117"></td>
          <td id="LC2117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Where thrift may follow fawning. Dost thou hear?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2118"></td>
          <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Since my dear soul was mistress of her choice</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2119"></td>
          <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And could of men distinguish, her election</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2120"></td>
          <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Hath scald thee for herself. For thou hast been</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2121"></td>
          <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As one, in suff&#39;ring all, that suffers nothing;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2122"></td>
          <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    A man that Fortune&#39;s buffets and rewards</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2123"></td>
          <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Hast ta&#39;en with equal thanks; and blest are those</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2124"></td>
          <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Whose blood and judgment are so well commingled</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2125"></td>
          <td id="LC2125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That they are not a pipe for Fortune&#39;s finger</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2126" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2126"></td>
          <td id="LC2126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To sound what stop she please. Give me that man</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2127" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2127"></td>
          <td id="LC2127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That is not passion&#39;s slave, and I will wear him</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2128" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2128"></td>
          <td id="LC2128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    In my heart&#39;s core, ay, in my heart of heart,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2129" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2129"></td>
          <td id="LC2129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As I do thee. Something too much of this I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2130" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2130"></td>
          <td id="LC2130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    There is a play to-night before the King.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2131"></td>
          <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    One scene of it comes near the circumstance,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2132"></td>
          <td id="LC2132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Which I have told thee, of my father&#39;s death.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2133" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2133"></td>
          <td id="LC2133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I prithee, when thou seest that act afoot,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2134" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2134"></td>
          <td id="LC2134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Even with the very comment of thy soul</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2135"></td>
          <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Observe my uncle. If his occulted guilt</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2136"></td>
          <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Do not itself unkennel in one speech,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2137"></td>
          <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    It is a damned ghost that we have seen,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2138"></td>
          <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And my imaginations are as foul</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2139"></td>
          <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As Vulcan&#39;s stithy. Give him heedful note;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2140"></td>
          <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For I mine eyes will rivet to his face,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2141"></td>
          <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And after we will both our judgments join</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2143"></td>
          <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Well, my lord.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2144"></td>

</td>

</td>

          <td id="LC2155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Excellent, i&#39; faith; of the chameleon&#39;s dish. I eat the air,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2156" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2156"></td>
          <td id="LC2156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    promise-cramm&#39;d. You cannot feed capons so.</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L2157" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2157"></td>
          <td id="LC2157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. I have nothing with this answer, Hamlet. These words are not</td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L2179" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2179"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2184" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2184"></td>
          <td id="LC2184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. O God, your only jig-maker! What should a man do but be merry?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2185" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2185"></td>
          <td id="LC2185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For look you how cheerfully my mother looks, and my father died</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2186" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2186"></td>
          <td id="LC2186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    within &#39;s two hours.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2187" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2187"></td>
          <td id="LC2187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. Nay &#39;tis twice two months, my lord.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2188" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2188"></td>
          <td id="LC2188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. So long? Nay then, let the devil wear black, for I&#39;ll have a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2189" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2189"></td>
          <td id="LC2189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    suit of sables. O heavens! die two months ago, and not forgotten</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2190" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2190"></td>
          <td id="LC2190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    yet? Then there&#39;s hope a great man&#39;s memory may outlive his life</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2191" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2191"></td>
          <td id="LC2191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    half a year. But, by&#39;r Lady, he must build churches then; or else</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2192" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2192"></td>
          <td id="LC2192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    shall he suffer not thinking on, with the hobby-horse, whose  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2193" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2193"></td>
          <td id="LC2193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    epitaph is &#39;For O, for O, the hobby-horse is forgot!&#39;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2194" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2194"></td>
          <td id="LC2194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2195" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2195"></td>
          <td id="LC2195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">               Hautboys play. The dumb show enters.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2196" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2196"></td>
          <td id="LC2196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2197" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2197"></td>
          <td id="LC2197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Enter a King and a Queen very lovingly; the Queen embracing</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2198" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2198"></td>
          <td id="LC2198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    him and he her. She kneels, and makes show of protestation</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2199" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2199"></td>
          <td id="LC2199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    unto him. He takes her up, and declines his head upon her</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2200" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2200"></td>
          <td id="LC2200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    neck. He lays him down upon a bank of flowers. She, seeing</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2201" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2201"></td>
          <td id="LC2201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    him asleep, leaves him. Anon comes in a fellow, takes off his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2202" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2202"></td>
          <td id="LC2202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    crown, kisses it, pours poison in the sleeper&#39;s ears, and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2203" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2203"></td>
          <td id="LC2203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    leaves him. The Queen returns, finds the King dead, and makes</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2204" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2204"></td>
          <td id="LC2204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    passionate action. The Poisoner with some three or four Mutes,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2205" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2205"></td>
          <td id="LC2205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    comes in again, seem to condole with her. The dead body is</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2206" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2206"></td>
          <td id="LC2206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    carried away. The Poisoner wooes the Queen with gifts; she</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2207" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2207"></td>
          <td id="LC2207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    seems harsh and unwilling awhile, but in the end accepts</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2208" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2208"></td>
          <td id="LC2208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    his love.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2209" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2209"></td>
          <td id="LC2209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                                         Exeunt.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2210" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2210"></td>
          <td id="LC2210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2211" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2211"></td>
          <td id="LC2211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. What means this, my lord?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2212" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2212"></td>
          <td id="LC2212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Marry, this is miching malhecho; it means mischief.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2213" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2213"></td>
          <td id="LC2213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. Belike this show imports the argument of the play.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2214" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2214"></td>
          <td id="LC2214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2215" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2215"></td>
          <td id="LC2215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                      Enter Prologue.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2216" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2216"></td>
          <td id="LC2216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2217" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2217"></td>
          <td id="LC2217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. We shall know by this fellow. The players cannot keep counsel;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2218" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2218"></td>
          <td id="LC2218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    they&#39;ll tell all.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2219" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2219"></td>
          <td id="LC2219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. Will he tell us what this show meant?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2220" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2220"></td>
          <td id="LC2220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Ay, or any show that you&#39;ll show him. Be not you asham&#39;d to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2221" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2221"></td>
          <td id="LC2221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    show, he&#39;ll not shame to tell you what it means.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2222" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2222"></td>
          <td id="LC2222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Oph. You are naught, you are naught! I&#39;ll mark the play.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2223" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2223"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC2224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Pro. For us, and for our tragedy,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2225" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2225"></td>
          <td id="LC2225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      Here stooping to your clemency,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2226" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2226"></td>
          <td id="LC2226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      We beg your hearing patiently.                     [Exit.]</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2227" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2227"></td>
