          <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    and his tricks? Why does he suffer this rude knave now to knock</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3800"></td>
          <td id="LC3800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    him about the sconce with a dirty shovel, and will not tell him</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3801"></td>
          <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of his action of battery? Hum! This fellow might be in&#39;s time a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3802"></td>
          <td id="LC3802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    great buyer of land, with his statutes, his recognizances, his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3803"></td>
          <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    fines, his double vouchers, his recoveries. Is this the fine of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3804"></td>
          <td id="LC3804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    his fines, and the recovery of his recoveries, to have his fine</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3805" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3805"></td>
          <td id="LC3805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    pate full of fine dirt? Will his vouchers vouch him no more of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3806" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3806"></td>
          <td id="LC3806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    his purchases, and double ones too, than the length and breadth</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3807" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3807"></td>
          <td id="LC3807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of a pair of indentures? The very conveyances of his lands will</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3808" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3808"></td>
          <td id="LC3808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    scarcely lie in this box; and must th&#39; inheritor himself have no</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3809" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3809"></td>
          <td id="LC3809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    more, ha?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3810" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3810"></td>
          <td id="LC3810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Not a jot more, my lord.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3811" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3811"></td>
          <td id="LC3811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Is not parchment made of sheepskins?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3812"></td>
          <td id="LC3812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Ay, my lord, And of calveskins too.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3813" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3813"></td>
          <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. They are sheep and calves which seek out assurance in that. I  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3814"></td>
          <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    will speak to this fellow. Whose grave&#39;s this, sirrah?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3815"></td>
          <td id="LC3815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Mine, sir.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3816"></td>
          <td id="LC3816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3817"></td>
          <td id="LC3817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [Sings] O, a pit of clay for to be made</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3818"></td>
          <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">              For such a guest is meet.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3819"></td>
          <td id="LC3819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3820"></td>
          <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I think it be thine indeed, for thou liest in&#39;t.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3821" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3821"></td>
          <td id="LC3821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. You lie out on&#39;t, sir, and therefore &#39;tis not yours.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3822" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3822"></td>
          <td id="LC3822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For my part, I do not lie in&#39;t, yet it is mine.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3823"></td>
          <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Thou dost lie in&#39;t, to be in&#39;t and say it is thine. &#39;Tis for</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3824"></td>
          <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the dead, not for the quick; therefore thou liest.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3825"></td>
          <td id="LC3825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. &#39;Tis a quick lie, sir; &#39;twill away again from me to you.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3826"></td>
          <td id="LC3826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. What man dost thou dig it for?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3827" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3827"></td>
          <td id="LC3827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. For no man, sir.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3828" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3828"></td>
          <td id="LC3828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. What woman then?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3829" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3829"></td>
          <td id="LC3829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. For none neither.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3830"></td>
          <td id="LC3830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Who is to be buried in&#39;t?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3831" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3831"></td>
          <td id="LC3831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. One that was a woman, sir; but, rest her soul, she&#39;s dead.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3832" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3832"></td>
          <td id="LC3832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. How absolute the knave is! We must speak by the card, or</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3833"></td>
          <td id="LC3833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    equivocation will undo us. By the Lord, Horatio, this three years</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3834" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3834"></td>
          <td id="LC3834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I have taken note of it, the age is grown so picked that the toe  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3835" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3835"></td>
          <td id="LC3835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of the peasant comes so near the heel of the courtier he galls</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3836" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3836"></td>
          <td id="LC3836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    his kibe.- How long hast thou been a grave-maker?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3837" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3837"></td>
          <td id="LC3837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Of all the days i&#39; th&#39; year, I came to&#39;t that day that our</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3838" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3838"></td>
          <td id="LC3838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    last king Hamlet overcame Fortinbras.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3839" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3839"></td>
          <td id="LC3839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. How long is that since?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3840" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3840"></td>
          <td id="LC3840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Cannot you tell that? Every fool can tell that. It was the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3841" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3841"></td>
          <td id="LC3841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    very day that young Hamlet was born- he that is mad, and sent</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3842" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3842"></td>
          <td id="LC3842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    into England.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3843" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3843"></td>
          <td id="LC3843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Ay, marry, why was be sent into England?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3844" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3844"></td>
          <td id="LC3844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Why, because &#39;a was mad. &#39;A shall recover his wits there;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3845" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3845"></td>
          <td id="LC3845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    or, if &#39;a do not, &#39;tis no great matter there.</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L3846" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3846"></td>
          <td id="LC3846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Why?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3847" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3847"></td>
          <td id="LC3847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. &#39;Twill not he seen in him there. There the men are as mad as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3848" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3848"></td>

          <td id="LC3849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. How came he mad?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3850" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3850"></td>
          <td id="LC3850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Very strangely, they say.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3851" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3851"></td>

          <td id="L3852" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3852"></td>
          <td id="LC3852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Faith, e&#39;en with losing his wits.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3853" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3853"></td>
          <td id="LC3853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Upon what ground?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3854" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3854"></td>
          <td id="LC3854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Why, here in Denmark. I have been sexton here, man and boy  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3855" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3855"></td>
          <td id="LC3855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    thirty years.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3856" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3856"></td>
          <td id="LC3856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. How long will a man lie i&#39; th&#39; earth ere he rot?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3857"></td>
          <td id="LC3857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Faith, if &#39;a be not rotten before &#39;a die (as we have many</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3858"></td>
          <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    pocky corses now-a-days that will scarce hold the laying in, I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3859"></td>
          <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    will last you some eight year or nine year. A tanner will last</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3860" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3860"></td>
          <td id="LC3860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    you nine year.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3861"></td>
          <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Why he more than another?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3862"></td>
          <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. Why, sir, his hide is so tann&#39;d with his trade that &#39;a will</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3863"></td>
          <td id="LC3863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    keep out water a great while; and your water is a sore decayer of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3864"></td>
          <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    your whoreson dead body. Here&#39;s a skull now. This skull hath lien</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3865"></td>
          <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    you i&#39; th&#39; earth three-and-twenty years.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3866"></td>
          <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Whose was it?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3867"></td>
          <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. A whoreson, mad fellow&#39;s it was. Whose do you think it was?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3868"></td>
          <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Nay, I know not.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3869"></td>
          <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. A pestilence on him for a mad rogue! &#39;A pour&#39;d a flagon of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3870"></td>
          <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Rhenish on my head once. This same skull, sir, was Yorick&#39;s</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3871"></td>
          <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    skull, the King&#39;s jester.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3872"></td>
          <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. This?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3873"></td>
          <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Clown. E&#39;en that.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3874"></td>
          <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Let me see. [Takes the skull.] Alas, poor Yorick! I knew him,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3875"></td>
          <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Horatio. A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy. He</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3876"></td>
          <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    hath borne me on his back a thousand tunes. And now how abhorred</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3877"></td>
          <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    in my imagination it is! My gorge rises at it. Here hung those</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3878"></td>
          <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    lips that I have kiss&#39;d I know not how oft. Where be your gibes</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3879"></td>
          <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    now? your gambols? your songs? your flashes of merriment that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3880"></td>
          <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    were wont to set the table on a roar? Not one now, to mock your</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3881"></td>
          <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    own grinning? Quite chap- fall&#39;n? Now get you to my lady&#39;s</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3882"></td>
          <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    chamber, and tell her, let her paint an inch thick, to this</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3883" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3883"></td>
          <td id="LC3883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    favour she must come. Make her laugh at that. Prithee, Horatio,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3884"></td>
          <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    tell me one thing.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3885"></td>
          <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. What&#39;s that, my lord?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3886"></td>
          <td id="LC3886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Dost thou think Alexander look&#39;d o&#39; this fashion i&#39; th&#39; earth?</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3887"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3888" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3888"></td>
          <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. And smelt so? Pah!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3889"></td>
          <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                          [Puts down the skull.]</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3890"></td>

        <tr>

          <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. To what base uses we may return, Horatio! Why may not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3892"></td>
          <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    imagination trace the noble dust of Alexander till he find it</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3893"></td>
          <td id="LC3893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    stopping a bunghole?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3894"></td>
          <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. &#39;Twere to consider too curiously, to consider so.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3895"></td>
          <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. No, faith, not a jot; but to follow him thither with modesty</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3896"></td>
          <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    enough, and likelihood to lead it; as thus: Alexander died,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3897"></td>
          <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Alexander was buried, Alexander returneth into dust; the dust is</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3898"></td>
          <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    earth; of earth we make loam; and why of that loam (whereto he</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3899"></td>
          <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    was converted) might they not stop a beer barrel?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3900"></td>
          <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Imperious Caesar, dead and turn&#39;d to clay,</td>

          <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    O, that that earth which kept the world in awe</td>

</td>

</td>

          <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Whose wicked deed thy most ingenious sense</td>

          <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. [comes forward] What is he whose grief  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3955"></td>
          <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Bears such an emphasis? whose phrase of sorrow</td>

          <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3960"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3961"></td>
          <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Thou pray&#39;st not well.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3962"></td>
          <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I prithee take thy fingers from my throat;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3963"></td>
          <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    For, though I am not splenitive and rash,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3964"></td>
          <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Yet have I in me something dangerous,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3965"></td>
          <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Which let thy wisdom fear. Hold off thy hand!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3966"></td>
          <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. Pluck thein asunder.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3967"></td>
          <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Queen. Hamlet, Hamlet!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3968"></td>
          <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  All. Gentlemen!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3969"></td>
          <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Good my lord, be quiet.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3970"></td>
          <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">             [The Attendants part them, and they come out of the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3971"></td>
          <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                                         grave.]</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3972"></td>
          <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Why, I will fight with him upon this theme</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3973"></td>
          <td id="LC3973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Until my eyelids will no longer wag.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3974"></td>
          <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Queen. O my son, what theme?  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3975"></td>
          <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I lov&#39;d Ophelia. Forty thousand brothers</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3976"></td>
          <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Could not (with all their quantity of love)</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3977"></td>
          <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Make up my sum. What wilt thou do for her?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3978"></td>
          <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. O, he is mad, Laertes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3979"></td>
          <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Queen. For love of God, forbear him!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3980"></td>
          <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. &#39;Swounds, show me what thou&#39;t do.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3981"></td>
          <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Woo&#39;t weep? woo&#39;t fight? woo&#39;t fast? woo&#39;t tear thyself?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3982"></td>
          <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Woo&#39;t drink up esill? eat a crocodile?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3983"></td>
          <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I&#39;ll do&#39;t. Dost thou come here to whine?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3984"></td>
          <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To outface me with leaping in her grave?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3985"></td>
          <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Be buried quick with her, and so will I.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3986"></td>
          <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And if thou prate of mountains, let them throw</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3987"></td>
          <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Millions of acres on us, till our ground,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3988"></td>
          <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Singeing his pate against the burning zone,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3989"></td>
          <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Make Ossa like a wart! Nay, an thou&#39;lt mouth,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3990"></td>
          <td id="LC3990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I&#39;ll rant as well as thou.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3991"></td>
          <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Queen. This is mere madness;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3992"></td>
          <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And thus a while the fit will work on him.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3993"></td>
          <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Anon, as patient as the female dove</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3994"></td>
          <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    When that her golden couplets are disclos&#39;d,  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3995"></td>
          <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    His silence will sit drooping.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3996"></td>
          <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Hear you, sir!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3997"></td>
          <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    What is the reason that you use me thus?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3998"></td>
          <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I lov&#39;d you ever. But it is no matter.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3999"></td>
          <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Let Hercules himself do what he may,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4000"></td>
          <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The cat will mew, and dog will have his day.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4001"></td>
          <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exit.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4002"></td>
          <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  King. I pray thee, good Horatio, wait upon him.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4003"></td>
          <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                                   Exit Horatio.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4004"></td>
          <td id="LC4004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [To Laertes] Strengthen your patience in our last night&#39;s speech.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4005"></td>
          <td id="LC4005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    We&#39;ll put the matter to the present push.-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4006"></td>
          <td id="LC4006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Good Gertrude, set some watch over your son.-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4007"></td>
          <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    This grave shall have a living monument.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4008"></td>
          <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    An hour of quiet shortly shall we see;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4009"></td>
          <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Till then in patience our proceeding be.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4010"></td>
          <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                                         Exeunt.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4011"></td>
          <td id="LC4011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4012"></td>
          <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4013"></td>
          <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4014"></td>
          <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4015"></td>
          <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Scene II.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4016"></td>
          <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elsinore. A hall in the Castle.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4017"></td>
          <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4018" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4018"></td>
          <td id="LC4018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enter Hamlet and Horatio.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4019"></td>
          <td id="LC4019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4020"></td>
          <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. So much for this, sir; now shall you see the other.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4021" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4021"></td>
          <td id="LC4021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    You do remember all the circumstance?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4022" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4022"></td>
          <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Remember it, my lord!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4023" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4023"></td>
          <td id="LC4023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Sir, in my heart there was a kind of fighting</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4024"></td>
          <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That would not let me sleep. Methought I lay</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4025"></td>
          <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Worse than the mutinies in the bilboes. Rashly-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4026"></td>
          <td id="LC4026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And prais&#39;d be rashness for it; let us know,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4027" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4027"></td>
          <td id="LC4027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Our indiscretion sometime serves us well</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4028" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4028"></td>
          <td id="LC4028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    When our deep plots do pall; and that should learn us</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4029"></td>
          <td id="LC4029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    There&#39;s a divinity that shapes our ends,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4030"></td>
          <td id="LC4030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Rough-hew them how we will-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4031"></td>
          <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. That is most certain.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4032"></td>
          <td id="LC4032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Up from my cabin,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4033" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4033"></td>
          <td id="LC4033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    My sea-gown scarf&#39;d about me, in the dark</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4034"></td>
          <td id="LC4034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Grop&#39;d I to find out them; had my desire,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4035"></td>
          <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Finger&#39;d their packet, and in fine withdrew</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4036"></td>
          <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To mine own room again; making so bold  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4037"></td>
          <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (My fears forgetting manners) to unseal</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4038"></td>
          <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Their grand commission; where I found, Horatio</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4039"></td>
          <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (O royal knavery!), an exact command,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4040"></td>
          <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Larded with many several sorts of reasons,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4041"></td>
          <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Importing Denmark&#39;s health, and England&#39;s too,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4042"></td>
          <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    With, hoo! such bugs and goblins in my life-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4043"></td>
          <td id="LC4043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That, on the supervise, no leisure bated,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4044"></td>
          <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    No, not to stay the finding of the axe,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4045"></td>
          <td id="LC4045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    My head should be struck off.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4046" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4046"></td>
          <td id="LC4046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Is&#39;t possible?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4047" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4047"></td>
          <td id="LC4047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Here&#39;s the commission; read it at more leisure.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4048"></td>
          <td id="LC4048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But wilt thou bear me how I did proceed?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4049"></td>
          <td id="LC4049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. I beseech you.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4050" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4050"></td>
          <td id="LC4050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Being thus benetted round with villanies,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4051"></td>
          <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Or I could make a prologue to my brains,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4052"></td>
          <td id="LC4052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    They had begun the play. I sat me down;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4053"></td>
          <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Devis&#39;d a new commission; wrote it fair.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4054"></td>
          <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    I once did hold it, as our statists do,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4055"></td>
          <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    A baseness to write fair, and labour&#39;d much</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4056"></td>
          <td id="LC4056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    How to forget that learning; but, sir, now  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4057"></td>
          <td id="LC4057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    It did me yeoman&#39;s service. Wilt thou know</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4058"></td>
          <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Th&#39; effect of what I wrote?</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4059"></td>
          <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Ay, good my lord.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4060"></td>
          <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. An earnest conjuration from the King,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4061"></td>
          <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As England was his faithful tributary,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As love between them like the palm might flourish,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4063"></td>
          <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    As peace should still her wheaten garland wear</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4064"></td>
          <td id="LC4064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And stand a comma &#39;tween their amities,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4065"></td>
          <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And many such-like as&#39;s of great charge,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4066"></td>
          <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That, on the view and knowing of these contents,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4067"></td>
          <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Without debatement further, more or less,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4068"></td>
          <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    He should the bearers put to sudden death,</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4069"></td>
          <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Not shriving time allow&#39;d.</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4070"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4071"></td>
          <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Why, even in that was heaven ordinant.</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L4072" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4072"></td>

          <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    which was the model of that Danish seal;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4074"></td>
          <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Folded the writ up in the form of th&#39; other,</td>

        <tr>

          <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Subscrib&#39;d it, gave&#39;t th&#39; impression, plac&#39;d it safely,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4076"></td>
          <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The changeling never known. Now, the next day  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4077"></td>
          <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Was our sea-fight; and what to this was sequent</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4078"></td>
          <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Thou know&#39;st already.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4079"></td>
          <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. So Guildenstern and Rosencrantz go to&#39;t.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4080"></td>
          <td id="LC4080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Why, man, they did make love to this employment!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4081"></td>
          <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    They are not near my conscience; their defeat</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4082"></td>
          <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Does by their own insinuation grow.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4083"></td>
          <td id="LC4083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    &#39;Tis dangerous when the baser nature comes</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4084"></td>
          <td id="LC4084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Between the pass and fell incensed points</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4085"></td>
          <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Of mighty opposites.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4086"></td>
          <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. Why, what a king is this!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4087"></td>
          <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Does it not, thinks&#39;t thee, stand me now upon-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4088"></td>
          <td id="LC4088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    He that hath kill&#39;d my king, and whor&#39;d my mother;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4089"></td>
          <td id="LC4089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Popp&#39;d in between th&#39; election and my hopes;</td>

          <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4090"></td>
          <td id="LC4090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Thrown out his angle for my Proper life,</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4093"></td>
          <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    To let this canker of our nature come</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4094"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    What is the issue of the business there.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4097"></td>
          <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. It will be short; the interim is mine,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4098"></td>
          <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    And a man&#39;s life is no more than to say &#39;one.&#39;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4099"></td>
          <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But I am very sorry, good Horatio,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4100"></td>
          <td id="LC4100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    That to Laertes I forgot myself,</td>

          <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4101"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC4102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The portraiture of his. I&#39;ll court his favours.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4103" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4103"></td>
          <td id="LC4103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But sure the bravery of his grief did put me</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4104" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4104"></td>
          <td id="LC4104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Into a tow&#39;ring passion.</td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4107" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4107"></td>
          <td id="LC4107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                 Enter young Osric, a courtier.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4108" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4108"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4109" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4109"></td>
          <td id="LC4109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. Your lordship is right welcome back to Denmark.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4110" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4110"></td>
          <td id="LC4110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I humbly thank you, sir. [Aside to Horatio] Dost know this</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4111" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4111"></td>
          <td id="LC4111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    waterfly?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4112" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4112"></td>
          <td id="LC4112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. [aside to Hamlet] No, my good lord.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4113" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4113"></td>
          <td id="LC4113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. [aside to Horatio] Thy state is the more gracious; for &#39;tis a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4114" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4114"></td>
          <td id="LC4114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    vice to know him. He hath much land, and fertile. Let a beast be</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4115" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4115"></td>
          <td id="LC4115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    lord of beasts, and his crib shall stand at the king&#39;s mess. &#39;Tis</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4116" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4116"></td>
          <td id="LC4116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    a chough; but, as I say, spacious in the possession of dirt.  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4117" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4117"></td>
          <td id="LC4117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. Sweet lord, if your lordship were at leisure, I should impart</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4118" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4118"></td>
          <td id="LC4118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    a thing to you from his Majesty.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4119" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4119"></td>
          <td id="LC4119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I will receive it, sir, with all diligence of spirit. Put your</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4120" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4120"></td>
          <td id="LC4120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    bonnet to his right use. &#39;Tis for the head.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4121" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4121"></td>
          <td id="LC4121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. I thank your lordship, it is very hot.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4122" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4122"></td>
          <td id="LC4122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. No, believe me, &#39;tis very cold; the wind is northerly.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4123" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4123"></td>
          <td id="LC4123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. It is indifferent cold, my lord, indeed.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4124" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4124"></td>
          <td id="LC4124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. But yet methinks it is very sultry and hot for my complexion.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4125" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4125"></td>
          <td id="LC4125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. Exceedingly, my lord; it is very sultry, as &#39;twere- I cannot</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4126" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4126"></td>
          <td id="LC4126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    tell how. But, my lord, his Majesty bade me signify to you that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4127" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4127"></td>
          <td id="LC4127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    he has laid a great wager on your head. Sir, this is the matter-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4128" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4128"></td>
          <td id="LC4128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I beseech you remember.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4129" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4129"></td>
          <td id="LC4129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                           [Hamlet moves him to put on his hat.]</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4130" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4130"></td>
          <td id="LC4130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. Nay, good my lord; for mine ease, in good faith. Sir, here is</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4131" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4131"></td>
          <td id="LC4131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    newly come to court Laertes; believe me, an absolute gentleman,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4132" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4132"></td>
          <td id="LC4132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    full of most excellent differences, of very soft society and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4133" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4133"></td>
          <td id="LC4133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    great showing. Indeed, to speak feelingly of him, he is the card</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4134" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4134"></td>
          <td id="LC4134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    or calendar of gentry; for you shall find in him the continent of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4135" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4135"></td>
          <td id="LC4135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    what part a gentleman would see.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4136" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4136"></td>
          <td id="LC4136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. Sir, his definement suffers no perdition in you; though, I  </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4137" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4137"></td>
          <td id="LC4137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    know, to divide him inventorially would dozy th&#39; arithmetic of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4138" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4138"></td>
          <td id="LC4138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    memory, and yet but yaw neither in respect of his quick sail.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4139" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4139"></td>
          <td id="LC4139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    But, in the verity of extolment, I take him to be a soul of great</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4140" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4140"></td>
          <td id="LC4140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    article, and his infusion of such dearth and rareness as, to make</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4141" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4141"></td>

          <td id="L4142" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4142"></td>

          <td id="LC4155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I would you did, sir; yet, in faith, if you did, it would not</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L4156" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4156"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L4157" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4157"></td>
          <td id="LC4157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. You are not ignorant of what excellence Laertes is-</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4158" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4158"></td>
          <td id="LC4158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. I dare not confess that, lest I should compare with him in</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4159" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4159"></td>
          <td id="LC4159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    excellence; but to know a man well were to know himself.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4160" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4160"></td>
          <td id="LC4160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. I mean, sir, for his weapon; but in the imputation laid on him</td>

        <tr>

          <td id="LC4161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    by them, in his meed he&#39;s unfellowed.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4162" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4162"></td>

          <td id="LC4163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. Rapier and dagger.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4164" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4164"></td>
          <td id="LC4164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Ham. That&#39;s two of his weapons- but well.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4165" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4165"></td>
          <td id="LC4165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Osr. The King, sir, hath wager&#39;d with him six Barbary horses;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4166" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4166"></td>
          <td id="LC4166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    against the which he has impon&#39;d, as I take it, six French</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4167" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4167"></td>
          <td id="LC4167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    rapiers and poniards, with their assigns, as girdle, hangers, and</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L4168" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4168"></td>
          <td id="LC4168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    so. Three of the carriages, in faith, are very dear to fancy,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4169" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4169"></td>
          <td id="LC4169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    very responsive to the hilts, most delicate carriages, and of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4170" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4170"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4171" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4171"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4172" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4172"></td>
          <td id="LC4172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Hor. [aside to Hamlet] I knew you must be edified by the margent</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
